#### Poster Specifications #### 

- Authors of posters are totally free in the design of their posters. 
- The size of the poster should not exceed the format A0 vertically oriented (width 84,1 cm x height 118,9 cm). 
- The posters will be exposed throughout the congress. 
- This will allow participants to read the posters during coffee and lunch breaks. 


Best poster and best oral communication awards:

The scientific committee will evaluate all posters and oral presentations and awards will be given for those selected as the best.
